summary: This document is a Condominium Rider that amends and supplements a mortgage agreement between the Borrower and Fifth Third Mortgage Company. It outlines the obligations of the Borrower regarding the condominium project, including insurance requirements and the handling of proceeds from insurance claims or condemnation.

persons.name: Fifth Third Mortgage Company
persons.context: Fifth Third Mortgage Company is identified as the lender in the mortgage agreement with the Borrower.

persons.name: Borrower
persons.context: The Borrower is the individual or entity securing the mortgage and is responsible for adhering to the terms outlined in the Condominium Rider.

locations: 435 S Tryon St Unit 700 Charlotte, NC 28202
keyFacts: The document is a Condominium Rider dated December 10, 2014.
It is incorporated into a mortgage agreement between the Borrower and Fifth Third Mortgage Company.
The property is located at 435 S Tryon St Unit 700, Charlotte, NC.
The Borrower is required to maintain property insurance and pay dues to the Owners Association.
Proceeds from insurance claims or condemnation are assigned to the Lender.
